Injector/Koga Shuko/Anubis/Hades/Sixshot/Unitron/Serpentor/Nemesis 
Enforcer/Scattershot:


Injector looked back to Cyber Claw as he ran.  "Hell Beast is the leader of 
the Predacons, and Megatron serves him!"

===

Koga Shuko fell to his back from the missile.

---  

Anubis grunted from shots, firing a missile off at Transantulas.

---

Hades slammed into a rock, firing three laser bolts off, attempting to cause 
mass rocks to collapse onto the shields of the tower.

---

Unitron fired 8 lasers (4 from one laser rifle each), and two optic blasts, 
all heading for the autocannon in the shields.

---

Serpentor fired off a powerful plasma blast from his plasma launcher (like a 
missile launcher only plasma energy).

---

Sixshot was at 20 ft now, barely above the ground.  Getting a lock, he fired 
four missiles off at the tower, gaining altitude quickly.

===

Nemesis Enforcer stopped, walking into the room, rifle raised.  Looking to 
Zardus in beast mode for a moment, he looked to the black box and DeathStorm. 
 "Transformation lock, eh?  I want in!" he yelled, pulling the trigger, 
firing 10 rapid laser bolts off at DeathStorm's chest torso.

---

Scattershot transformed into robot mode, entering the Alliance base and 
heading for his quarters, hearing laser bolts he smiled.  Taking out his 8 
inch energon blade, he laughed.  "Time to gut someone!" he yelled, walking 
slowly towards the source.
